items.sentence: I feel like eating something that isn\'t sweet.
I think it\'s dangerous to walk alone at night.
I think it\'s time for me to abandon that idea.
Tom didn\'t know Mary spoke French so fluently.
Tom didn\'t know anyone who could speak French.
Tom didn\'t know how many cups of sugar to add.
Tom didn\'t know how to ask the right question.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was already married.
Don\'t worry. We\'ll get to the bottom of this.
I wonder why Tom suggested we do that together.
